name: Beat Survivors
description:
Use the fullscreen button for a better experience. Controls
  • asdw or arrows to move
  • Mouse to aim and click to shoot

Click on rythm to shoot. Bonus that are working for a state are working for the state before.

Game

Rythm game + Vampire Survivors like game

You will need audio.

A wave of enemy come to you every ten seconds, good luck.

Other

For some the web build lags on chrome. Firefox seems to works better.

Use the desktop build for a better experience.

Updates

1.1: Add a screen before the game to show controls.
